column4: anybody know how to get the atlantis compiz plugin as a pre compiled package?
compiling isn't really my bag
unless you can't find it on google, then what do you do? come here, that's what i'm doing
i downloaded mIRC just for this specific purpose
what are you searching for?
2 things actually
i've got somebody on the first one
but right now i want to know if there is any way to download a precompiled deb package of the atlantis compiz plugin
Since compiz frequently fucks up on my machines - I don't know too much about it - aside from - I want to get fucking rid of it
i can help you get rid of it if you don't want it
I would uninstall it - but lucid currently has a screwed up gnome-shell package :(
that blows
yeah and I haven't even started with all the bugs I have in lucid ;)
yea, i'm using a wubi installation of ubuntu 9.10 on a toshiba laptop and i've got compiz running like a dream
yeah - 9.10 was a lot better
i want to make mine look like the linux beauty video on youtube
I'm a simple man - I just want it to work ;)
lol
i want mine to work and look pretty :P
you will NEVER get that ;)
well since i can make mine look pretty i just want it to look as pretty as possible and have it work alsoo
